hero.title: Create your Form
hero.subtitle: In Seconds Not in Hours
hero.description: Generate, publish and share your form right away with AI. Dive into insightful results, charts and analytics.
hero.howItWorksDescription: The process of creating and distributing professional forms has never been easier.

steps.step1Description: Add clear instructions for completing the form to ensure quality responses.
steps.step2Description: Customize the form to your needs using FormCraftAI's advanced editing tools.
steps.step3Description: Share the form with your target audience and get immediate insights on form performance.

sign-in.title: Sign in to your account
sign-in.description: Sign in to the system using a popular account or create a new account.

sign-up.title: Sign up for a new account
sign-up.description: Sign up to the system using a popular account or create a new account.
